title: Riot are you EVER going to do something that isn't so blatantly profit driven.
body:
Hey look at this pool party thing what a great opportunity for the community to all band together and try to get rewards, NOPE.

You get 5 points, FIVE POINTS, for getting FIVE players together for a game and playing a possibly 40 minute game, or... you can just gift a random person a 5 dollar gift which takes ONE minimum wage person 30 minutes to earn at maccas and get 20 POINTS, QUADRUPLE THE POINTS, or gift someone you know and still get 10. Riot already has this all calculated out that the higher point regions are IMPOSSIBLE to hit by just banding up and playing together, this is going to net them hundreds of thousands of dollars, it's just so disgusting will you EVER do anything ANYTHING that isn't heavily financially driven.

And the rewards aren't even GOOD, mystery champion, seriously  MYSTERY CHAMPION? that could be fking 450ip champion? are you SERIOUS? at least give people the choice, pool party icon, another useless icon, pool part minions, couldn't really care, and for high level players you are anal about csing will only find this annoying if anything,  55 million points free mundo skin, I'm already assuming this is basically impossible to hit unless the player base spends like $500k+ dollars on mystery gifts

Note: I'm not saying Riot could start giving people free sht constantly, but in like the 5 years this game has been live they just do nothing that isn't blatantly profit based, hell they gave us like a week of group bonus ip which they send might be permanent then fked it off because clearly it was going to hurt their profits slightly despite the fact it was clearly bringing people together to play 5's, (if it wasn't then there was no reason to remove it) 

This is why I despise this company, even Jagex made more efforts with its community in the early years.

If you're so concerned about the inner incentives of massively successful company, perhaps you should finish school/start earning a decent wage -god forbid, start your own company and see how enjoyable watching your bank balance grow is.
